sentences.en: Because asinine leg is too long, not be be impassable, however asinine ear is too long.
sentences.cn: 又不是因为驴腿太长了过不去, 而是驴耳朵太长了嘛.

sentences.en: But, know farmer rides asinine need coming home 2 to 3 hours.
sentences.cn: 但是, 知道农夫骑驴回家需要2到3个小时.

sentences.en: He sells soya bean asinine tie on a tree.
sentences.cn: 他把驴拴在一棵树上就卖黄豆去了.

sentences.en: I must have been insane to listen to your asinine gibberish!
sentences.cn: 我真是昏了头居然听信了你的胡说八道!
那是个愚蠢透顶的讨论。

sentences.en: Result, be cut off bridle asinine spirit away.
sentences.cn: 结果, 被人割掉僵绳把驴偷走了.

sentences.en: We are not Duke Hsiang of Sung and have no use for his asinine ethics.
sentences.cn: 我们不是宋襄公,不要那种蠢猪式的仁义道德.

sentences.en: What an asinine thing to say!

words.tran_cn: 驴的；愚蠢的，固执的；驴子似的

trans.tran_cn: 驴的，像驴的，极蠢的，倔强的
